abstract: An AT&T executive says the company is considering the use of anti-piracy filtering technologies on the network level.
snippet: An AT&T executive says the company is considering the use of anti-piracy filtering technologies on the network level.
lead_paragraph: UPDATEDFor the last 15 years, Internet service providers have acted – to use an old cliche – as wide-open information super-highways, letting data flow uninterrupted and unimpeded between users and the Internet.

headline.main: AT&T and Other I.S.P.’s May Be Getting Ready to Filter

abstract: Shares tumbled late in the day after AT&T’s chief  suggested consumers might be cutting back and Countrywide Financial denied it was tumbling into bankruptcy.
snippet: Shares tumbled late in the day after AT&T’s chief  suggested consumers might be cutting back and Countrywide Financial denied it was tumbling into bankruptcy.
lead_paragraph: Shares tumbled late Tuesday after the head of AT&T suggested that consumers might be cutting back and Countrywide Financial denied that it was tumbling into bankruptcy.

headline.main: Stocks Dive on Reports of New Ills
headline.print_headline: Stocks Dive On Reports Of New Ills
